events.title: OpenAI Releases GPT-5 with Enhanced Reasoning Capabilities
events.description: OpenAI announced the release of GPT-5, featuring significant improvements in logical reasoning and multimodal understanding. The new model demonstrates advanced capabilities in complex problem-solving and scientific research applications.

events.title: Apple Stock Surges 8% After Strong Q4 Earnings Report
events.description: Apple Inc. reported exceptional Q4 earnings, exceeding analyst expectations. Revenue reached $89.5 billion, driven by strong iPhone sales and services growth. Stock price jumped 8% in after-hours trading.

events.title: Gold Prices Hit Record High Amid Economic Uncertainty
events.description: Gold prices reached an all-time high of $2,100 per ounce as investors seek safe-haven assets amid global economic concerns. Central bank buying and inflation fears continue to drive demand.

events.title: New Quantum Computing Breakthrough Achieves 99.9% Error Rate Reduction
events.description: Researchers at IBM announced a major breakthrough in quantum computing, achieving a 99.9% reduction in error rates. This advancement brings practical quantum computing applications significantly closer to reality.

events.title: Major Policy Shift: New Climate Legislation Passes Senate
events.description: The Senate passed comprehensive climate legislation with bipartisan support, including $500 billion in green energy investments and new carbon emission standards. The bill now moves to the House for final approval.
